page.title: 09CHILDREN'S DAY AT THE BOWL
page.content: On Sunday 7th July a children's day was held at the Milton Keynes bowl.There were 1000s of people there.When we first got there we looked around to see what there was.I went on the octopus ride twice.I liked the hoopla stool I had 8 goes on it and I won 7 keyrings I went on the pick-a-string and pick-a-nail I won 50p. At 4 o'clock they had a countdown and let off all the balloons for the second Milton Keynes balloon race I let off one with my sister.Just after they were let off an airoplane went through them.They had 3 sky divers who landed in the arena.They had stunt people on motor bikes jumping onto each others bikes.They had donkey derbys for people 5-12 years of age and under 8 stone.
